oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-07-28 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 28, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Marty Robbins (host/performer), guest performers Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Bobby Hicks, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Marty Robbins; Rod Brasfield; Bill Monroe; Blue Grass Boys; Bobby Hicks
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Marty Robbins -- Do You Call That Waiting (Marty Robbins) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Marty Robbins introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Marty Robbins introduces Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys -- I Believed In You Darling (Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys) -- Marty Robbins introduces Bobby Hicks -- Mississippi Sawyer (Bobby Hicks fiddle) -- Marty Robbins talks -- In The Garden (Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Marty Robbins introduces Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Wood, Del; Atkins, Chet; Hicks, Bobby; Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996; Blue Grass Boys; Robbins, Marty
